short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turns on and off twitter wide view

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple extension allowing you to turn on and off twitter wide view. It simply removes the right section of the page when it's on and expands the width of the middle section.
